body.name: Nineigh Phone Tripod, 70" Tripod for iPhone Cellphone, Selfie Stick Tripod Stand with Remote Phone Holder, Versatile Travel Tripod for Recording Photo Selfies Vlog Live Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 28 mins
features: 【70" Phone Tripod Stand】The Nineigh phone tripod has four adjustable locking clips that extend from 17.7" to 70" to meet your different shooting needs. This versatile tripod is suitable for recording life, including family gatherings, traveling, hiking, camping, parties, sports activities, and other activity scenarios. Feel free to switch between various modes such as selfies, group photos, video blogging, YouTube videos, podcasts, Facebook Live and more.

【Flexible Tripod for Phone】This selfie tripod comes with 180° rotating head and 360° rotating cell phone holder. Whether you want to shoot horizontally, vertically, top-down, or overhead, all the angles you want are available. You can adjust the phone tripod stand as you like to get the best angle to capture the wonderful moments. This cell phone tripod is the best choice for daily photo recording.

【Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote】The tripod stand can be detached and used as a selfie stick alone. As a long selfie stick, you can have a larger field of view and ultra-wide angle shots, perfect for selfies and group photos. The phone tripod comes with a wireless remote control, easy to carry around. Easy to operate, quick pairing, stable and reliable connection for a seamless photo experience. Compatible with iPhone and Android.

【Portable Phone Tripod】The phone stand tripod is made of premium aluminum alloy, sturdy and durable. The cell phone tripod base is equipped with silicone non-slip feet, which makes the tripod stand more stable and not easy to shake after unfolding. The travel tripod is only 17" when fully collapsed, can be easily put into a backpack or handbag, easy to carry.

【Tripod for Cell Phone & Camera】The video tripod uses a standard 1/4" screw. It fits most digital devices with 1/4" mounting holes, such as DSLRs, sports cameras, webcams, ring lights, and microphones. It is not recommended for large and heavy equipment. Universal phone holder mounting width range of 2.4"-3.6", fits iPhone 15 14 13 12 11 Pro/XS/XR/MAX/8/8 Plus/X/7 Plus/6s Plus/6s/6s/6 Plus/6 and most other smartphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Some improvements
reviews.reviewText: This item is great for the price! It worked with my large sized iPhone really well. We used it to take family photos and it was great. I do with it could hold larger items for recording. Like my sons iPad. I would help him when he’s recording an assignment for school. Overall a great functional product.

reviews.reviewText: Couldn't ask for a better tripod. Love the height it goes to and it is stable.

reviews.reviewerName: I received a different variety not the stargazers they advertised.  Not going to buy to this company again.

reviews.reviewText: I like how it's easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile tripod and selfie stick
reviews.reviewText: I borrowed this style tripod from a friend and loved it so much I had to get my own. This tripod didn't disappoint. I wasn't able to give it all five stars because the clamp fingers aren't long enough to hold the phone stable if there is a pop-socket or deep case. My S22 has a case for credit cards as well as a finger catch and it is right on the verge of being too deep for the spring loaded clamp. It stills works good as I primarily use it for filming sports and I keep it fairly protected.The clasps that hold the pole extended are fantastic. No thumb turn screws, a simple pull and push clip. They hold great and are easy enough for young kids to use.The base is fantastic. It can be wide or narrow, warning, it does have a twist lock. It doesn't take much to hold it in place, and has wide ergonomic flares for grip.I've never used a selfie stick, so I can't wait for the next road trip.This collapses so small and can be packed almost anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best!
reviews.reviewText: Better than all the rest. I can’t imagine why this product doesn’t have reviews! I’ve tested and inspected it and it’s awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A great stand for the value
reviews.reviewText: For the price of this tripod, it does what its supposed to. Slender, not difficult to use.The phone holder is a bit clunky and imprecise, I was frustrated with it after a few uses but got accustomed to it. The bottom legs seem to have trouble staying in place, even when tightened, but I generally only have this in a single spot so it is not too much of a problem.So again, it is a great tripod for the value.
